CGEIT.definition: Certified in the Governance of Enterprise IT

PCI DSS.definition: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard

FERPA.definition: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act

COBIT.definition: Control Objectives for Information and Related Technologies

AICPA.definition: American Institute of Certified Public Accountants

FEDRAMP.definition: Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program

CAPTCHA.definition: Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart

TACACS+.definition: Terminal Access Controller Access-Control System Plus

CCMP.definition: Counter Mode with Cipher Block Chaining Message Authentication Code Protocol

CNSSI.definition: Committee on National Security Systems Instruction
